summary:
Yieldification: An Innovative Real Yield DeFi NFT Utility Protocol - Yieldification offers a unique feature set of NFT utility in addition to real yield generation through perpetual futures trading, NFT marketplace, lending/borrowing of stake NFTs, and much more!

 Perks of Partnering with YDF - Enhanced Token Utility, Visibility Through Co-marketing, Referral Revenue, Community Engagement, Brand Awareness, Partnership Networking, New Platform Features

 Yieldification Tokenomics - The tokenomics are designed such that long term holders are rewarded and incentivized to stake for the long term.

 Yieldification Features - Unique NFT utility, Staking implementation, Revenue generating utility, Sustainable project

 How to Buy YDF - Get Metamask, Buy ETH, Buy YDF, Start Staking
